mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO order_item(order_no, goods_Id, goods_barcode, goods_name, sale_price, send_score_ratio, send_scores, quantity, total_amount, refund_quantity, refund_amount, refund_scores) VALUES
(#{item.orderNo}, #{item.goodsId}, #{item.goodsBarcode}, #{item.goodsName}, #{item.salePrice}, #{item.sendScoreRatio}, #{item.sendScores}, #{item.quantity}, #{item.totalAmount}, #{item.refundQuantity}, #{item.refundAmount}, #{item.refundScores})
